item.title: 【UPSCALED】Alan Walker & Sasha Alex Sloan - Hero [4K AI Upscale HEVC 10-bit / PCM]
item.description:
Released: May 4 2023
Genre: Electropop, Eurodance
Video Source: Vimeo, 1080p
Audio Source: Tidal, thanks Yennifer

"Hero" is a song by British-Norwegian music producer and DJ Alan Walker and American singer-songwriter Sasha Alex Sloan, released on May 4 2023. The song is a perfect blend of Walker's signature cinematic melodies and undulating basslines with Sloan's powerful vocals. The lyrics of the song celebrate the unsung heroes who brighten up our lives every day, making it an emotive anthem that listeners can connect with.

"Hero" is sure to be a hit this summer, and fans can expect to hear it during Walker's upcoming festival performances. The track follows his recent collaboration with NCS, "Dreamer," and is the second of many new releases planned for 2023.

"I've been looking forward to releasing this song called 'Hero' for a long time. It's also been a pleasure working with Sasha Alex Sloan and her incredible voice. This track is about celebrating the very dear people we see as heroes. Recognizing the work they've put in to make this world brighter and more resilient. I hope 'Hero' inspires our listeners to embrace their inner hero, live openly and love deeply." - Alan Walker‍

"I was so excited when Alan asked me to sing on this track. I've been a fan of his since faded and I'm stoked for our song to be out in the world." - Sasha Alex Sloan

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and converted to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (Tidal, CD quality), synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced and edited to match the music video.
Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
